Oak_Lawn.Ashland Avenue station:
Ashland Avenue is a commuter rail station along the Blue Island Branch of the Metra Electric line in Calumet Park, Illinois. The station is located on Ashland Avenue near 124th Street, and is 17.87 miles (28.76 km) away from the northern terminus at Millennium Station. In Metra's zone-based fare system, Ashland Avenue is in zone D.
Parking is available across from the station south of the 123rd Street bridge over Interstate 57.
